name: How figure out Epic Level BAB, AB?
author: Asturonethoriusaline

posts.author: Asturonethoriusaline
posts.content:
Hi all, I'm doing a Monk/Cleric/Rog build in another thread.

I did, was doing a level by level buikd summary, that stopped at 20, didnt get to 21 to 40 because got help.

Then after that, posting a edited, revised level by level build summary.

I have done the 1st 20 levels, 10 levels per post, 2 post.

I asked for comments about it wait until after all 40 levels of the build gets posted.

So now I am at posting levels 21 to 40, starting with levels 21 to 30.

Question is: How do I figure out BAB, AB in epic levels?

Part of the reason I ask this, is someone else posted their build, and it had 14 BAB in levels 1 to 20.

Then at the end of their 40 lev build, they had BAB listed at 24, but their build summary doesnt show how they got from BAB 14 to BAB 24 in levels 21 to 40.

My build has 14 BAB also lev 1 to 20. But I dont know how to figure out what BAB would be levels 21 to 40.

I checked the Wiki for Cleric and Rogue(Took Monk 1 at 4th level), and all the entries show is:

Example:

Cleric 1 to 20: 15 BAB.

Levels 21 to 40 it just shows the epic bonus feats, etc, but no BAB numbers for levels 21 to 40.

So how do I figure out what the BAB numbers are for levels 21 to 40?

Reason I didnt post this in the otber tbread,is didnt want this to bury the 40 lev by lev build summary, until it is finished and people have a chance to comment on it, if they want to.

Thanks for any help.

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content: In epic levels you get +1 BAB on every odd level and +1 saves on every even level. The BAB increase from epic levels doesn't increase the number of attacks per round your build has. [https://nwn.fandom.com/wiki/Level_progr ... rogression]
